name: FileMaker Plug-in
summary: Learn about .FMPLUGIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FMPLUGIN files are actually folders. To view their contents manually, remove the ".fmplugin" file and open the resulting folder. FileMaker plug-ins are developed in C or C++ and must adhere to the FileMaker plugin specification.

description: Plug-in used by FileMaker Pro, a desktop database program; contains compiled program code that adds functionality to the program; can add features such as custom data parsing, macros, or custom printing jobs.
